channel.title: Does anyone have a fix for
channel.description:
The blood rune glitch where if you Withdraw 'X' or withdraw all with blood runes (From bank) It crashes the server...
I dont mean replacing them with ecto-tokens either just so you know, i need a fix ;P
thanks.
